page.title: 17Dentistry
page.content: There are three Dental Practices in the town. All three are similar although one, Geldeard's is more recently established. They all carry out all forms of treatment mainly within the National Health Service but with a few private patients. An appointment system operates. Each practice has two or three Dental Surgeons, several Dental Surgery Assistants and Receptionists. A General Medical Practitioner visits regularly to administer general anaesthetics. Difficult cases are referred to Shrewsbury or Stoke. Dentures are made locally or in Shrewsbury or Newcastle.There is now a greater emphasis on conservation and prevention. A greater patient awarenes together with measures such as flouride in toothpaste has brought about a reduction in tooth decay.
